trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to replace COM-based data binding in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 提供介面，以取代從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級的應用程式中的 COM 架構資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> to a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains a property name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，其中包含屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the name of a data field.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，其中包含資料欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the key value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，其中包含索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> to a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains a property name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，其中包含屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the key value.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to bind immediately; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示立即繫結，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> to a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of binding objects.
trans-unit.target: 清除繫結物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bindings in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 中的繫結總數。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that contains the count.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，包含計數。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data member for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 的資料成員。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the name of the data member.
trans-unit.target: 包含資料成員名稱的 <see langword="String" />。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A COM-based <see langword="msdatasrc.DataSource" /> object.
trans-unit.target: COM 架構 <see langword="msdatasrc.DataSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`disposing 參數設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放任何參考這個控制項的 managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> at the specified index.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> interface from a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 移除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 介面。

trans-unit.target: 判斷是否要將變更儲存在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />。

trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current row from the data source of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> object and resets the contents of controls bound through the object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" /> 物件的資料來源取得目前的資料列，並重設透過物件繫結的控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection.UpdateMode" /> for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection.UpdateMode" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection.UpdateMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection.UpdateMode" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。
